Champion.Name: Aatrox
Champion.AbilityDetails: Aatrox Cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it.

Champion.Name: Ahri
Champion.AbilityDetails: Ahri fires an orb in a line that returns to her, damaging enemies it passes throguh.

Champion.Name: Akali
Champion.AbilityDetails: Akali throws shurkines in front of her, dealing damage

Champion.Name: Anivia
Champion.AbilityDetails: Anivia channels a large hailstorm for 6s, damaging enemies inside of it.

Champion.Name: Ashe
Champion.AbilityDetails: Ashe fires an arrow that travels across the map, damages and stuns(stun duration is 1s / 1.5s / 2s per hex traveled).

Champion.Name: Aurelion Sol
Champion.AbilityDetails: Aurelion channels for 0.35s and breathes a large blast of fire in a line, dealing damage to enemies

Champion.Name: Blitzcrank
Champion.AbilityDetails: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him

Champion.Name: Brand
Champion.AbilityDetails: Brand launches a fireball that bounces 4 / 4/ 6 time, damaging enemies hit.

Champion.Name: Cho'Gath
Champion.AbilityDetails: Cho'Gath ruptures a 3 hex area area, stunning for 1.5s / 1.75s / 2s and damaging enemies inside of it.

Champion.Name: Evelynn
Champion.AbilityDetails: Evelynn deals damae to the 3 closest enemies and teleports away. Damage is increased by 3x / 4x / 5x against enemies below 50% health.

Champion.Name: Gangplank
Champion.AbilityDetails: Gangplank periodically creates barrels. On cast, Gangplank detonates the barrels, damaging nearby enemies.

Champion.Name: Garen
Champion.AbilityDetails: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for 4s, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies

Champion.Name: Gnar
Champion.AbilityDetails: Gnar transforms gaining 250 / 450 / 650 health and jumps behind the furthest enemy, damage and shoving enemies backwards.

Champion.Name: Graves
Champion.AbilityDetails: Graves' attacks deal splash damage to nearby enemies.

Champion.Name: Jayce
Champion.AbilityDetails: Jayce knocks away an enemy in melee range, dealing damage and stunning them for 2.5s / 4.25s / 6s. He then transforms his hammer into a cannon, increasing his attack range by 3 hexes and gaining max attack speed for a 3 / 5 / 7 attacks

Champion.Name: Jinx
Champion.AbilityDetails: Jinx gets excited as she participates in kills. On her first takedown, she gains 60% / 80% / 100% Attack Speed. On her second, she swaps to her rocket launcher causing her attacks to deal bonus area damage.

Champion.Name: Kai'sa
Champion.AbilityDetails: Kai'sa dashes to the farthest enemy unit, gaining a damage shield and 50% / 75% / 100% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Champion.Name: Karthus
Champion.AbilityDetails: Karthus deals damage to 5 / 7 / 9 random enemies after a long channel.

Champion.Name: Kassadin
Champion.AbilityDetails: Kassadin's attacks steal mana from enemies, converting it into a shield for 4s.

Champion.Name: Katarina
Champion.AbilityDetails: Katarina channels and fires daggers at 4 / 6 / 8 nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing healing for 3s.

Champion.Name: Kayle
Champion.AbilityDetails: Kayle shields 1 / 2 / 3 allies, making them immune to damage.

Champion.Name: Kennen
Champion.AbilityDetails: Kennen summons a storm around him, dealing damage and stunning enemies inside of it for 1.5s.

Champion.Name: Kha'Zix
Champion.AbilityDetails: Kha'Zix slashes the closest enemy, dealing bonus damage to enemies that are alone.

Champion.Name: Kindred
Champion.AbilityDetails: Kindred creates a zone around herself for 3s / 4s / 5s that prevents allies from dying.

Champion.Name: Leona
Champion.AbilityDetails: Leona calls down a solar ray, stunning enemies in the center for 5s / 7s / 9s and dealing damage to enemies inside it.

Champion.Name: Lissandra
Champion.AbilityDetails: Lissandra encases the target in ice, stunning them for 1.5s and dealing damage to nearby enemies. Below half HP lissandra instead encasesherself, becoming untargetable for 2s.

Champion.Name: Lucian
Champion.AbilityDetails: Lucian dashes away to safety and attacks an enemy twice, once with Attack Damage and once with Spell Damage.

Champion.Name: Pantheon
Champion.AbilityDetails: Pantheon leaps in the air, becomes untargetable, and crashes down towards the farthest enemy stunning them for 2s. As he lands, Pantheon deals magic damage to all enemies in his path based off their Maximum Health. They then burn for an additional percentage of their Maximum Health as True Damage over a few seconds and applies Grievous Wounds.

Champion.Name: Poppy
Champion.AbilityDetails: Poppy brings down her hamer, knocking away 1 / 2 / 3 nearby enemies for 2s.

Champion.Name: Sejuani
Champion.AbilityDetails: Sejuani creates a large glacial storm, stunning enemies within it after a short delay for 2s / 3.5s / 5s.
